00027 #include <geometry/IGeometricAggregateAbstract.h>
00028 #include <geometry/IPoint.h>
00029 /// \brief
00030 /// The GisIMultiPoint class is a multi-point aggregate Geometry type.
00031 class GisIMultiPoint : public GisIGeometricAggregateAbstract
00032 {
00033 public:
00034 
00035     /// \brief
00036     /// Gets a point at the given zero-based index.
00037     /// 
00038     /// \param index 
00039     /// Input Zero-based index in the object's list of points.
00040     /// 
00041     /// \return
00042     /// Returns a point
00043     /// 
00044     GISGEOM_API virtual GisIPoint* GetItem(
00045         GisInt32 index) const = 0;
00046 
00047     /// \brief
00048     /// Gets the ordinates as an array.
00049     /// 
00050     /// \remarks
00051     /// The caller must not free the returned array.
00052     /// The ordinates are in the order XYZMXYZM..., with only those present 
00053     /// according to the dimensionality.
00054     /// 
00055     /// \return
00056     /// Returns the ordinates
00057     /// 
00058     GISGEOM_API virtual const double * GetOrdinates() = 0;
00059 
00060 protected:
00061 
00062     /// \brief
00063     /// Constructs a default instance.
00064     /// 
00065     /// \return
00066     /// Returns nothing
00067     /// 
00068     GISGEOM_API GisIMultiPoint() {};
00069 
00070     /// \brief
00071     /// Default destructor.
00072     /// 
00073     /// \return
00074     /// Returns nothing
00075     /// 
00076     GISGEOM_API virtual ~GisIMultiPoint() {};
00077 };
00078 #endif
